post.body: @r_achie http://tinyurl.com/6lg9sv =]
I WILL SLAP YOU GIRLFRIEND. *SNAP*

ah yes, yeah i really wasn't paying that much attention, i'll explain sometime
why exactly did you think i was on drugs? :S
lol, you CONVENIENTLY left that part out sar ;)
lol, always makes me laugh
Don`t you remember when I was a bird And you were a map~
stardust was an awesome film, and weird as fuck too. =]
yeah sounds like wario ware :P
erm, we've played smooth moves before? describe the game to me. =]
package tracking makes you crazy :(
get a rubik's cube. =]
Yeah streetlight were supposed to be supporting but the cancelled, which sucks, but random hand are good (Y)
OH JESUS MAN GET ON IPLAYER AND WATCH IT NOW
where are you seeing it?
huh, what an odd coincidence =S
that'll be godzilla taking out the pylons again. (Y)
I think i may have another game for you to play and suck at sarah, aha =D
You're growing up. *cries* =']
shit man, that sucks, specially just before christmas...
Graphics card fuck it up? :S
"Also I ejaculate boiling venom, so I'd need to wear like fifty condoms." oh cracked you do make me laugh xD

"KRISTEN STEWART
Hey, your eyes are changing color from gorgeous to ultragorgeous"
LMAO
god i feel so cold =S
its been raining all day, we've been sat inside playing games :( and my hands feel almost numb :S
OMGWTFBBQ
is a jade because he has Irish relations, a daffodil because he has a hard stalk, and a pineapple. You do worry me sometimes. =']
kieran is slightly worried about his friends. You know, in a good way.
So boycott love Detox just to retox~
only an hour driving lesson as it turns out, awesome.
streetlight. just, i'll explain today., @orribull we're out of ammo goddammit ='(
still loving folie, still loving what a catch, how can you not get the crazy good feeling?
mums being sick.... oh dear...
probably set off in a minute, havn't got much to do around here, want to get joe's present to him. etc =]
almost killed myself again, and mick of course, that'll teach him for ruining my relationship with sarah! *shakes fist*
FUCK DRIVING
i really need to get my mum something, but i dont have any time... shit.
waiting for hairdresser, then waiting for dan
just got a parcel from conors Icelandic girlfriend xD
TOP GEAR
waiting in eager anisipation for top gear, and drinking some fine cointreau. awwwwww yeeeeaaaah =]
going to see my other nephew! i'm a dunkle people! =D
That top gear special was immense.
I FINALLY FINISHED THAT FUCKING CUBE. I'M FREE!!!!!!!
They had the baby!
Going to see my mums friends, probably play left 4 dead with dan if he's on when i'm back, otherwise, its prince of persia (Y)
not in the slightest bit drunk. Whats wrong with me =/
I got a Pocket synth! aha! :D
Wishes everyone a very merry Christmas, although i probably will be online at some point tomorrow. Have a good one ^^
Just seen my uncle for the first time in a while, hugging him is like hugging a shorter version of my dad.. =S
